page.title: 07WORTH ABBEY AND CHURCH
page.content: There are 5 major things the monks are involved in. They are{The School, {Dulwich, Peru, Lay Community}and{the {Parish.}The Parish extends for 15 miles around the{Abbey}and{Church They built a new Church which was finished on July 13th 1975 and seats about 1000. The seats are positioned in a circular fashion.There is a relic which is sacred and is said to be a piece of{Oliver Plunkett's}back bone. He is a famous Irish Martyr. The furnishings in the{Blessed Sacrament {Chapel}are given in memory of{Simon {Dominic Wood,}a 13 yr old boy who died of a heart attack in Sept.1972 after scoring a try in a home rugby match.On top of the church is a{bronze cross which was positioned by a helicopter. The monks in{Dulwich}have recently set up a Monastic Pastoral Centre for prayer, spirituality and social work.
